Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey, let's catch up on what's been happening with people in the Australian economy... From millions facing a tricky tax season due to the loss of a vital income offset to businesses prioritizing ways to boost employees' flu vaccinations due to the expected very bad season, it's been a roller coaster. Workers are also missing out on superannuation payments, leading to billions lost, while structural budget deficits run the risk of continuing for decades unless something changes dramatically. Turnbull and his G20 counterparts tackle that with inflation and interest risk levelling too.
